name: Para//ax
summary:
Greetings, Operator! You're here because you have agreed to operate a PARA//AX class robot for this mission. It's simple, you need to get in, get to the core, and destroy it. Sounds easy enough, right?

Though, there is one thing we've noticed... Every time we send a different bot in there, the layout of the ship changes. Whether this is because of some sort of nanotechnology, hologram, or magic, it shouldn't be a problem for you. We're sure you have all of the tools you need to handle unfamiliar environments.
